name: Push Notification UI Card
description:
Hi,

I made this notification UI card for my company project. Our company had decided to make a Push Notification APP for the Shopify Platform. This project has not come into the light due to some reason.


Push Notification will work like social proof and recommendation. It will psychologically encourage visitors to buy the product. 


My design file is still here in my Figma. So, I decided to make it public and share it with my design community for educational purposes.
